mapper.select: select * from usergoal where user_id = #{userId} order by case when goal_name = '1억 모으기' and target_amount = 100000000 then 0 else 1 end, created_at desc
mapper.update: update usergoal set goal_name = #{goalName}, keyword = #{keyword}, target_amount = #{targetAmount}, goal_date = #{goalDate}, memo = #{memo}, goal_status = #{goalStatus}, updated_at = now() where goal_id = #{goalId}
mapper.select: select * from usergoal where user_id = #{userId} and goal_name = '1억 모으기' and target_amount = 100000000 limit 1
